biotools.summary: Tool to identify SNPs among bacterial isolates. BactSNP can detect SNPs and create a simple TSV file with SNP information as well as an alignment FASTA file containing reconstructed pseudo-genomes of the target isolates in a one-step process.

bioschemas.name: BactSNP
bioschemas.summary: Tool to identify SNPs among bacterial isolates. BactSNP can detect SNPs and create a simple TSV file with SNP information as well as an alignment FASTA file containing reconstructed pseudo-genomes of the target isolates in a one-step process.
